txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Dusky ears from sturdy beasts throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'I will make certain that the taxidermist gets these forthwith.\n\n'Thank you.'
'Sometimes the taxidermist in town needs extra ears to ply his trade...he is the one that asked for these. He can make any ear look like a particular beast he says. Who am I to argue?'
Men of Bree Task:  Dusky Ears
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of dusky ears from beasts within Bree-land.
Deliver the dusky ears to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding dusky ears from the stronger beasts in Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Dusky ears from sturdy beasts throughout Bree-land.
